Package edu.univ.scientometrics.entity

Class ResearcherEntity

java.lang.Object
edu.univ.scientometrics.entity.ResearcherEntity
@Entity public class ResearcherEntity extends Object
JPA Entity representing an academic researcher in the database. This class maps to the 'researchers' table and stores author information from Google Scholar. Maintains a one-to-many relationship with articles. SOLID Principles: - Single Responsibility: Only represents researcher data and relationships - Open/Closed: Extensible through JPA features
Since:
1.0
Author:
Sprint 3 Team
